sentences.english: He spent his golden years traveling to many parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他通过周游世界度过了晚年的幸福时光。

sentences.english: "Wang Zhaojun" is one of Caoyu's famous dramas in his late years.
sentences.chinese: 《王昭君》是曹禺先生晚年戏剧创作的代表作之一。

sentences.english: The secret of a good old age is simply an honorable pact with solitude.
sentences.chinese: 安度晚年的秘诀，就是和孤独签订体面的协议。

sentences.english: Obviously, a line of astroid nebula is a result which the star old age evolves.
sentences.chinese: 可见，行星状星云是恒星晚年演化的结果。

sentences.english: In later years, Salinger become famous for not wanting to be famous, refusing interviews.
sentences.chinese: 晚年的塞林格却因为拒绝采访不愿出名而为世人所知。

sentences.english: Leaping over Caudine Forks is a theoretical viewpoint put forth by Marx in his remaining you.
sentences.chinese: 跨越卡夫丁峡谷是马克思晚年提出的一个理论观点。

sentences.english: I never dreamt that I would spend my old age in such comfort and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我做梦也没想到我能过这样舒适幸福的晚年。

sentences.english: Many a retired worker has hoped for a secure old age.
sentences.chinese: 许多退休职工都希望有一个无忧无虑的晚年。

sentences.english: First of all, may I extend my new year  greetings to all of you, because according to Chinese lunar calendar, today is the 10th day of the first month of the Year of the Tiger.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中国农历虎年正月初十，我先给大家拜个晚年。

sentences.english: The old man spent his old age in contentment.
sentences.chinese: 那位老人晚年过得很称心。

sentences.english: A residence for an individual who retired from work to spend rest of his life enjoying his hobby.
sentences.chinese: 这栋住宅的主人是个退休的老人，在此安享晚年。

sentences.english: In his late years, his poetry of mourning for friends were blurry with waning color.
sentences.chinese: 晚年的悼友诗贵隐括，带着一层衰颓的色彩。

sentences.english: There are other obstacles to later-life dating.
sentences.chinese: 晚年恋爱还有其他的障碍。

sentences.english: They had enough money to live in comfort in their old age.
sentences.chinese: 他们有足够的钱舒舒服服地安度晚年。

sentences.english: Late in life he became chief cook at a restaurant in Corbin.
sentences.chinese: 晚年，他成了科尔宾一家餐馆的主厨。

sentences.english: Washington longed to retire to his fields at Mount Vernon.
sentences.chinese: 华盛顿希望能够解甲归田，在弗农山庄安享晚年。

definition: evening scene/circumstances of one's declining years
lit. to nurture one's years (idiom)/fig. to enjoy one's later years
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
approaching one's end/with one foot in the grave
